message: "Being able to send a quick text for help can just be a matter of life and death," explains Casey Alvarez, Executive Director, GO 61. Texting and online chatting in English and Spanish 24/7 has become the latest outlet for victims of human trafficking to alert authorities and get information on how to escape.

data.description: (Springfield, Mo.--02/08/18) As technology continues to evolve, so does the battle against human trafficking..
data.title: Human trafficking hotline now accepts text messages 24/7
